name: CocoVent 1.0
description:
Play as a crazy chicken that can create items.

You can launch planes, watch stupid astronauts and check your pc for power.

in the future I will add:

Bombs

Other rooms

Other cards

Other playmode.

What's new?:

Magnet - P

Anti magnet - L

Slowmove - A

Vacuum cleaner - S

Soundtrack in main menu

New main menu
